title: Search Advertising Entity Attributes
description: Defines common set of attributes across various entities defined on search advertising platforms - for example campaign, adgroup, keywords and ads. Search Advertising Attributes base class needs to be extended in all search advertising entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: External Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Identifier that defines uniqueness of the entity on the search advertising platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Internal Identifer that maps to Search Advertising Platform - Google Adwords, Bing MSN, Yahoo Gemini, Baidu.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Advertising Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Defines Name of the Search Advertising Platform for the given entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique Name for the entity - e.g Campaign Name, Ad Group Name.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Created Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Created Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform.This differs from creation time of the entity in external advertising platform partners.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Modified Time for the given entity in Ad Cloud Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Modified Time of the entity in the Ad Cloud Platform. This differs from modified time of the entity in external advertising platform partners.
